titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Defense to prepare a plaque honoring American servicemen who lost their lives during "Operation Tiger" in April 1944.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Defense to prepare a plaque honoring American servicemen who lost their lives at Torcross, England, during "Operation Tiger" in April 1944 during a secret exercise rehearsing the invasion of Normandy.
